I've created a list alias at Sourceforge for us to advertise as
a webmaster-problems-with-crawler contact address:

    archive-crawler-agent@...

We should use this address, rather than any personal address,
as the contact address in the User-Agent and From HTTP headers,
when we run our crawler. 

However, we should also try to keep this address out of the CVS
templates, so that it is not used by unaffiated third parties. 

To subscribe, visit:

    https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/archive-crawler-agent

(The messages sent to this list should not be publicly archived.)

- Gordon
